TopicTitle: Meet me In Zero G bug?!

Articles.Content:
As the title suggests, I'm working on the MMIZG mission.   I get the Apollo Rocket into orbit just fine.   Actual made it under the 10 minute deadline.   

I get the "congrats, sit back and wait for Gemini to launch" dialog, and it switches to the Gemini on the pad.    Problem is, in map view, or when Gemini hits it's required starting orbit, there
is NO Apollo ship in orbit as well.    Can't make a Hohman Transfer to something that isn't there.

I've gone to the tracking station, and Apollo doesn't show as active there either.   I've made sure all the "show" icons are checked, so I don't think I'm hiding it by mistake from the screen.

Anyone else have this issue?   I've checked video tutorials, and they all seem to show the Apollo in it's orbit even before launching the Gemini.

Thanks in advance.
Never mind.   Apparently a fresh install seems to have solved the issue.
